question_text: What happens if a device that requires PoE++ is connected to a PoE+ switch port?
answer_options: The device draws reduced power and operates in low-power mode
The device powers on with full functionality
The device will not power on
correct_answer: The device will not power on
explanation: PoE standards are backward compatible but not forward compatible — a higher power device like PoE++ won’t work with a lower-rated switch like PoE+.
